document_name: Strategy and action plan for adaptation to climate change in Luxembourg 2018-2023
document_description:
This document sets out the government's adaptation strategy for the period 2018-2023. A set of adaptation measures are proposed in the fields of energy, infrastructure, water management, urban environment management, agriculture, etc. The plan notably outlines strategies to:
  1.  expand awareness on the object of energy savings and the expansion of decentralised solar energy;
  2.  expand biomass power plants taking into account aspects of sustainability in the framework for the national review of the EU climate change agreement
  3. adjust building standards in extreme weather conditions
  4. develop infrastructure and initiative measures to reduce vulnerability.

These strategies will be implemented by each ministry within their existing means.
